encoder.name: Hexadecimal Encoder
encoder.author: Thomas Shaw
encoder.description: Takes ASCII strings and encodes each character into it's hexadecimal representation.
encoder.hint: Convert the hexadecimal (base 16) string into its ASCII value, character by character in sets of 2. Use an ascii table e.g. http://www.asciitable.com OR an online converter e.g. https://www.branah.com/ascii-converter
